transcript:
Customer: Radhe fail ho gaya hai.
Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Pratik mai Pratik bol raha hu.
Customer: Haan haan boliye.
Executive: Ji maine na wo aapko aapka jo buylead ka yearly hai na wo aapke cashback ke against maine mail kar diya hai wo kal tak aapko allot ho jayega. Mai try kar raha hu ki wo aaj sham tak ya raat tak hi ho jaye.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Jaisa ki mera aapke sath discussion hua hai wo kal tak ho jayega. Theek hai kal dopahar se pehle ho jayega itna hai.
Customer: Kitni aa jayengi yearly me?
Executive: Aap maan ke chalo jo abhi humne calculate karke dala hua hai aap 40-45 maan kar chaliye.
Customer: 40-45 bahut kam hai.
Executive: Sir itna hi ho payega kyuki hamare jo accounts me hai usi ke calculation ke according hi hoga jitna hamare paas bacha rehta hai hum utna hi de pate hai usse jyada aapko nahi allot kar sakte.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Samajh lijiye wo bhi matlab hamare hath me nahi hota hai wo bhi calculation ke hath me hota hai wo bhi team ke hath me hota hai. Aap samajhiye is baat ko please.
Customer: Jab pichli saal do saal ka tha tab to jyada mil rahi thi ab teen saal ka hai to kam mil rahi hai.
Executive: Mai batata hu aapke jaise na accounts ke paas ya fir hamari management quota ke paas agar wo lead hai jaise maine abhi check kara to aapke accounts pe hum calculate kar rahe hai cashback ke amount ke against me to hame 40 se 45 ke beech me hi aa rahi hai wo bhi confirm nahi hai isliye mai aapko 40 se 45 bol raha hu. Hai na?
Customer: Accha accha.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji. Mai ek baar fir se confirm kar leta hu ki total kitni valid aapko allot hongi wo mai bata dunga. Otherwise ye kal tak aapko jitni bhi hai aapko aapke accounts me dikh jayengi. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai theek hai bhai thank you.
Executive: Ye ho jayega. Baki ye ticket aapne customer care pe call kiya tha agar aap permission de to mai ticket close kar du.
Customer: Permission kis chiz ka ticket humne?
Executive: Nahi jaise agar aap kabhi bhi kahi mere alawa directly aap customer care pe call karte ho na to ek ticket open ho jata hai ki aap client se ek baar call karke unka concern jaan lijiye unka solve kar dijiye aisa.
Customer: Accha accha accha. To theek hai to close kar dijiye. Mera kal ho gaya kaam fir to.
Executive: Aapke paas aapke paas feedback ke liye jayega sir please thoda dekh lijiyega. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai theek hai okay okay.
Executive: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquiring about the number of buyleads.

- Customer states 40-45 buyleads are very less.



Resolution:

- Executive informed buyleads depend on account calculation.

- Executive will confirm the total valid buyleads.

- Executive asked for permission to close the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, cashback, ticket
